name: Bansoko
description:
A reimagined, space-themed clone of MS-DOS Soko-Ban from 1984. All 60 original levels included + mod support.

Welcome to Bansoko!

You are a scavenger. You collect cargos that people have left in abandoned ships in deep space. It's a dangerous job, that's why we're using robots.

Your goal is to use a remotely controlled robot to push all crates to cargo bays. Remember, you can only push them (you cannot pull) Fortunately, in case of mistake you can undo as many steps as you need.

Good luck!

  • 60 levels from original DOS Soko-ban from 1984 + ending,
  • Fully documented source code released under MIT license,
  • Modding support which allows to add new level packs and change whole look&feel of the game.

You control the robot using keyboard:

 - move robot/push crate up

 - move robot/push crate down

 - move robot/push crate left

 - move robot/push crate right

 - undo last move


  • Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Ubuntu 20.04 (64-bit)

Download package for your operating system and extract its content to a place of your choice. 

From there, simply run:

bansoko

Your save file will be created at your home directory at:

.bansoko/
